tool_description:
List of all the cards and scenarios of marvel snap. With all their data, power, cost, abilities, effects, and images of their variants.

All data can be filtered and sorted. You can both list them and get the detail.

The data is updated daily to make sure that all cards are always available.
name: Marvelsnap cardgame API
title: Marvelsnap cardgame API

api_list.name: Card detail
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://marvelsnap-cardgame-api.p.rapidapi.com/3-agent13"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marvelsnap-cardgame-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://marvelsnap-cardgame-api.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "marvelsnap-cardgame-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Card list
api_list.description: List of all the cards and scenarios of marvel snap. With all their data, power, cost, abilities, effects, and images of their variants. Sort default by `name`.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: You can sort DESC adding `-` at start. Example: `-power`.

optional_parameters.name: ability
optional_parameters.description: You can search inside all ability of any card using this field. Example: `add creature`.
